attributes.action: Raise a vote of no confidence in the Cabinet and the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: I would like the House to take account of the views of the public whose tax payments funds MPs and take action to raise a vote of no confidence in the current government.
attributes.background: The Cabinet and the Prime Minister have proven themselves unworthy of the position they hold.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
